study_plan.Day 1: ### Study Plan for Introduction to Graphs
study_plan.Day 3: #### Day 1: Understanding the Basics of Graphs
study_plan.Day 4: - **Task:** Read about what a graph is and its components (vertices, edges).
study_plan.Day 8: - **Task:** Learn about different types of graphs (undirected, directed, weighted, unweighted).
study_plan.Day 12: - **Task:** Study different graph representations (adjacency matrix, adjacency list).
study_plan.Day 16: - **Task:** Learn about Depth-First Search (DFS) and Breadth-First Search (BFS) algorithms.
study_plan.Day 20: - **Task:** Explore properties of graphs (connectivity, cycles, bipartite graphs).
study_plan.Day 24: - **Task:** Review all topics covered; solve practice problems related to graphs.
study_plan.Day 27: This plan ensures each concept is tackled with sufficient time for comprehension and reinforces understanding through practice. Good luck with your exam preparation!
